home.headline: Tech Leader, Mentor, and Innovator
home.subline: Hi! I'm Aashni, a startup advisor, angel investor, and innovation leader with a passion for helping businesses scale and build impactful solutions. I create products in my free time, mentor founders, and support women in the tech ecosystem.
home.intro: I help startups scale, build impactful products, and drive innovation. With experience at Microsoft, Amazon, and Square, I’ve led teams, created platforms like HypeDocs and Mido, and advised startups like Pawtrip and Monadd. I’m also a board member and nonprofit director, passionate about making a difference through technology and strategy.

about.label: About
about.title: About me
about.description: Meet Aashni, Tech Leader, Mentor, and Innovator from Canada and Kenya

intro.title: Introduction
intro.description: Aashni is a dual citizen of Canada and Kenya with a decade of experience in software engineering, startups, and board-level leadership. She is passionate about creating innovative products, advising businesses, and fostering inclusivity in tech. With expertise spanning Microsoft, Amazon, Square, and various startups, she combines technical excellence with a deep understanding of entrepreneurship.

Kingsway Group.achievements: Modernizing operations with a tech lens across industries such as hotels, malls, entertainment, and auto services.

Microsoft, Amazon, Square (Block).achievements: Developed and launched global products impacting millions of users.

Startups and Products.achievements: Built HypeDocs and MIDO, advised startups like Pawtrip and Blossom, and provided angel investments to promising ventures.

University Education.description: Studied software engineering and gained expertise in building scalable systems.

Self-Learning.description: Continuously learning through courses, mentorship, and hands-on experience in product development and leadership.

React and Next.js.description: Expert in building next-gen apps with frameworks like React and Next.js.

Supabase.description: Experienced in leveraging Supabase for scalable backend solutions.

Product Development.description: Proficient in creating and launching SaaS products that solve real-world problems.
